abstract: The television critic Neil Genzlinger is taking your questions on "Terra Nova," "The Playboy Club" and all things television.
snippet: The television critic Neil Genzlinger is taking your questions on "Terra Nova," "The Playboy Club" and all things television.
lead_paragraph: Neil Genzlinger, a television critic for The New York Times, acknowledges the ambition of the new Fox show "Terra Nova," but in an exchange with readers he questioned what that really means: "In TV-speak, 'ambitious' generally means 'expensive.' In the real sense of the word -- risk-taking, ground-breaking, etc. -- 'Terra Nova' is in most ways the opposite of ambitious."
